description: The phase focused on defining functional and technical specifications, process flows, and solution architecture.
Implementation of features or fixes through coding, configuration, or integration.
Validation of system behavior through manual or automated testing to ensure correctness and compliance.
The activity of adapting or migrating a fix or feature from a higher release to a lower release version.
Ongoing support tasks such as bug fixing, configuration changes, and performance optimization.
Any other activity not covered above, such as documentation or training.
